TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Tjailjaking, title = Tjailjaking, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tjailjaking} }

S.FORM: Tjailjaking Itiniay i Sandimen Cen no Pingtung ko Tjailjaking a niyaro', 240 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 875 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 820 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 55 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan84%, Rukai2%, Bunun1%, Puyuma1%, roma5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Tjailjaking Itiniay i Sandimen Cen no Pingtong ko Tjailjaking a niyaro', 240 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 875 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 94% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 820 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 6% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 55 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan84%, Rokai2%, Bonon1%, Poyoma1%, roma5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
